Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
After that, the same exchange at the supermarket.  
I won't be able to go to that shopping district for a while, it's too awkward.  
...Well, I suppose cats are cute, I guess.  

[Vanilla]: "Hm? Sniff, sniff, sniff, sniff..."  
[Vanilla]: "Smells like something really good is coming from over there."  
[Chocola]: "Really! It's so fragrant and delicious, Master!"  
[Kashou]: "Indeed. This scent... "  
Turns his face toward the direction the smell is coming from.  

[Street Vendor Cat]: "Welcome!"  
[Street Vendor Cat]: "How about some fresh, hot takoyaki?"  
[Street Vendor Cat]: "Hot and crispy, with plenty of bonito flakes—how about it?"  
[Chocola]: "Wow, a cat takoyaki vendor! That's rare, Master!"

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: "So you can become a good girl!"  
[Vanilla]: "Shigure, you're strict. But thanks to you, I've learned so much."  
[Shopkeeper]: "Is that so? You're a good master, aren't you?"  
[Chocola]: "Ah, but Master is Master!"  
[Chocola]: "Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan, after all! Right, Master?"  
[Vanilla]: "Translating, Shigure is an important friend."  
[Vanilla]: "Only my master gets to call you 'Master'."  
[Shopkeeper]: "Ahaha. You're really loved, Master-sama?"  
[Kashou]: "Well, I'm grateful for that."  
A light nudge with an elbow.  
A self-conscious smile in reply.  
...Out in public, it's still a little embarrassing.

As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Yes, um..."  
Minaduki Kashou: "…I'm afraid these don't seem to be the items I ordered."  
Dish Supplier: "…Eh, really?"  
Dish Supplier: "Does that mean the goods are wrong…?"  
Minaduki Kashou: "No, the items I ordered are actually here, but…"  
Minaduki Kashou: "As you can see, we don't need nearly this many dishes here…"  
Dish Supplier: "S-sorry! I'll check with headquarters right away!"  
Dish Supplier: "Could you please wait a moment!?

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[Tableware Vendor]: "It appears there was a mistake on our end, and your order got mixed up with another one..."
[Tableware Vendor]: "Since Master Minaduki's order is likely needed soon..."
[Tableware Vendor]: "If it's convenient, I'd appreciate it if you could take delivery of your ordered tableware..."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Take delivery of the ordered items..."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "...Huh? You mean from in here?"
A towering stack of cardboard boxes.
Stunned into silence.
All of them look identical.
Without opening them, there's no way to know what's inside.
And judging by the delivery slip, each one contains only the finest tea sets and tableware.
So handling them requires the utmost care—or things could go very wrong.
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Well, I do have preparations for opening, so I'd be grateful to receive them today..."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "...But taking all of these now? That's going to take a lot of time, isn't it?"

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "……If only I could live as simply as a cat, it'd probably be a lot easier."
Gazing at the shop name posted on the window.
Shaking off a wry smile, he began clearing away the newly arrived tea set.
[Vanilla]: "Hey, that takoyaki stand isn't here today."
The same park street in the late afternoon as yesterday.
But there was no sign of the food cart today.
With no one at home to send the cats to, and no one around today in particular.
I'd also left the key to the family home behind.
So I'm just heading out for a bit of shopping to pass the time until Shigure gets home.
[Chocola]: "……Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!"
[Chocola]: "What was it again? Was it catnip?"
[Vanilla]: "Pretty much that."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、疲れたなら少し休んでくか？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、はい、少しだけ……」
[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」
[バニラ]: 「じゃあ私、何か飲み物買ってくる」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。全員分な」
[バニラ]: 「了解。任された」
バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Shokora, if you're tired, why don't you rest for a bit?"
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just for a little..."
Chocola: "But I'm fine. I'm sorry for worrying you, Master."
Minaduki Kashou: "…There's no need to apologize."
He gives a faint, troubled smile, bowing his head slightly.
He already knows perfectly well why she's lacking energy.
So there's nothing he can say.
Minaduki Kashou: "Then, there's a bench right over there. Why don't you rest for a bit?"
Vanilla: "Then I'll go get something to drink."
Minaduki Kashou: "Yeah, please. Get something for everyone."
Vanilla: "Got it. Leave it to me."
He hands Vanilla some change and gently guides Shokora toward the bench.
The sea breeze sweeps through the park trees, rustling them gently.

metadata:
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「形も揃って時間は容赦なく過ぎてくけど……」
今朝届いたばかりのショップカードに手を伸ばす。
[ショコラ]: 「にゃにゃにゃっ！？　ご主人さま、なんですか！　それはなんですかー！」
[バニラ]: 「おお。これはもしや、ショップカードというやつでは」
[ショコラ]: 「すごい、すごいですご主人さま！　お店の住所とか電話番号まで書いてますよー！」
[バニラ]: 「お店の情報がもろバレの一枚」
[バニラ]: 「個人情報保護にうるさい時代に危機感のない」
[嘉祥]: 「いやショップカードってそういうもんだから」
個人情報保護とか知ってるのにショップカードは知らないのか。
まぁ確かに変な営業とか来たら面倒だけども。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Time did fly by when we were trying to get everything prepared though...」
I reached for the business cards that had just arrived that morning.
[Chocola]: 「Meow meow meow?! Master, what are those?! Just what could those be?」
[Vanilla]: 「Ohh. Could those be those things called "business cards?"」
[Chocola]: 「Amazing! That's amazing, Master! It even has the shop's address and phone number on it!」
[Vanilla]: 「It's a single card that tells you everything about this shop.」
[Vanilla]: 「You have no sense of discretion in an era where everyone is protective of their privacy.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's exactly what business cards are used for.」
She knew about protecting personal information, but not about business cards...?
Well, it was true that it would be a pain if I was in some sort of strange business or something.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "The forms are all ready, and time passes without mercy..."

Reaching for the shop card that just arrived this morning.

Chocola: "Nyanyanyaa!? Master, what is it! What is that!?"

Vanilla: "Oh. Could this be what they call a shop card?"

Chocola: "Amazing, amazing, Master! It even has the store's address and phone number!"

Vanilla: "A card that reveals all the store's information."

Vanilla: "Completely oblivious to the dangers in an era so strict about personal information protection."

Minaduki Kashou: "Well, that's just how shop cards are."

Knowing about personal information protection, yet unaware of shop cards?  
Well, sure, it'd be troublesome if weird salespeople showed up, but...

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[バニラ]: 「にゃっ！（ぱしっ）」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「にゃにゃー！　にゃにゃにゃにゃにゃーっ！！（ぱしっ、ぱしっ）」
[嘉祥]: 「……やっぱりネコなんだなぁ」
普通の猫用のオモチャに夢中になってる二匹を見て実感。
まぁご自由にって書いてあるし、とりあえずほっとこう。
[嘉祥]: 「えーと、ネコ関係の本はどこだろうな……」
店内を見渡しているとエプロンを付けた店員さんが近寄って来てくれる。
[店員]: 「何かお探しですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ネコの飼い方の本とかってありますか？　人型ネコの」
[店員]: 「はい、もちろんございますよ。こちらになります」
[嘉祥]: 「……ずいぶんたくさんあるんですね、ネコの本って」
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「...... Meow! Fwahp!」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Meow meow! Meow, meow meow, meow meow!! (Fwahp fwahp!)」
[Kashou]: 「... You two really are cats.」
That was how I felt, watching those two get so engrossed in a regular cat toy.
Well, it did say "Go Ahead," so for now, I'll just let them play with it.
[Kashou]: 「Hmm, where can I find books on catgirls...」
As I looked around the store, an apron-clad shop clerk came up to me.
[Shop Clerk]: 「Is there anything I can help you with?」
[Kashou]: 「Do you have any books on raising cats? The humanoid kind.」
[Shop Clerk]: 「Yes, certainly! They would be over here.」
[Kashou]: 「... Wow, there sure are a lot of books on catgirls.」
ModelAnswer:
[Vanilla]: "Nyaa! (pashit)"
[Chocola & Vanilla]: "Nyanyaa! Nyanyanyanyanyaa!! (pashit, pashit)"
[Kashou]: "……Yeah, they really are cats, huh."
He felt it more deeply as he watched the two completely absorbed in ordinary cat toys.
Well, it says "feel free" on the sign, so I'll just leave them be for now.
[Kashou]: "Hmm, where would the cat-related books be...?"
As he scanned the store, a staff member wearing an apron approached.
[Staff]: "Are you looking for something?"
[Kashou]: "Do you have any books on how to raise cats? Specifically, humanoid cats?"
[Staff]: "Yes, of course we do. This way, please."
[Kashou]: "……There are so many cat books, aren't there?"

Question:

いにゃっちゃ、い、いらっ、いいいいらっしゃいませぇえぇ！！」
[女性客]: 「ひゃあぁあぁぁっ！？　な、なな、なななな何ですかっ！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ご、ご注文はにゃんでしょうかっ！？」
[ショコラ]: 「あっ、お、オススメはアレです、アレ！　えっと、アレです！！　ケーキ！！」
[バニラ]: 「紅茶もあるの……！　その、あったかいのと、冷たいのと……！」
[バニラ]: 「えっと、熱いのと、えっと、冷たいのと……！！」
[嘉祥]: 「お前らはちょっと落ち着け」
入店してきたお客に強烈に詰め寄る二匹を引っぺがす。
[嘉祥]: 「大変失礼致しました。店長の水無月と申します」
[嘉祥]: 「こちらがメニューになっておりますので、ごゆっくりお選び下さ――」
reference_answer:
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「M-Meow, w-welcommmmme!!
[Female Customer]: 「Hyaaaaah?! Wh-Wh-What is going on?!」
[Chocola]: 「W-What would you like to meowrder?!」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, o-our special is that... that thing! Uhm, that!! Cake!!」
[Vanilla]: 「We also have black tea...! Uhm, the warm kind and the cold kind...!」
[Vanilla]: 「U-Uhm, the hot kind and uhm, the cold kind...!!」
[Kashou]: 「Will you two calm down?」
I pulled them back after they quickly set themselves upon the customer who'd just walked in.
[Kashou]: 「I'm terribly sorry for that. I'm the owner of this bakery, Minaduki.」
[Kashou]: 「Our menu is over here. Please peruse it at your leisur--」
ModelAnswer:

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨？]: 「商売とは稼げる時には非情にでも稼がねば成り立たぬのです！」
[時雨？]: 「それに兄さまにそんな冷たい目で見られたら悲しい！　悲しいのです！」
[時雨？]: 「これでも何か力になれればと思って今日まで我慢をしましたのにっ……！　うぅぅっ……！！」
[嘉祥]: 「だから選り好みとかじゃなくてだな……」
泣きが入って来た上にキャラがブレブレ。
何が言いたいのかまったくわからない。
[ショコラ]: 「あ、時雨ちゃんだー！　久しぶりー♪　元気にしてたー！？」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、何その格好？　流行ってるの？」
[時雨？]: 「あ、こら！　ワシは時雨ちゃんではなっ……！」
[時雨？]: 「あっ、ちょ、外套を引っ張るでな……あっ、あ……ちょ！」
reference_answer:
[Shigure?]: 「When it comes to business, you won't get anywhere if you don't jump at every opportunity to make money!」
[Shigure?]: 「Besides, to see Nii-sama give me such a cold look is making me sad! I'm sad!」
[Shigure?]: 「And after I held back until today to do something to help you too...! Uuuu...!!」
[Kashou]: 「Look, I'm not being picky here...」
Not only had she now burst into tears, but her façade was in shambles.
I had no clue what to say.
[Chocola]: 「Ah, Shigure-chan~! It's been a while~ ♪ How have you been~?!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure, what's with that outfit? Is that what people are wearing now?」
[Shigure?]: 「Y-You're mistaken! I am not this Shigure-chan you speak of...!」
[Shigure?]: 「Ah, stop! Don't pull on my cloak... ahh, ah... wait.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure?]: "A business must be ruthless in making money when it can!"
[Shigure?]: "And it's heartbreaking to be looked at with such a cold gaze from my brother-sama! It's truly heartbreaking!"
[Shigure?]: "I've endured all this time, hoping I could be of some help...! Uuuu...!!"
[Kashou]: "That's why it's not about being picky..."
The crying was too much, and the character was completely off.
I have no idea what she's trying to say.
[Chocola]: "Ah, Shigure-chan! Long time no see!~ How've you been?!"
[Vanilla]: "Shigure, what's with that outfit? Is it trendy now?"
[Shigure?]: "Ah, hey! I'm not Shigure-chan...!"
[Shigure?]: "Ah, wait! Don't pull my coat like that... Ah, ahh... Wait!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[アズキ]: 「よー。数日ぶりだな、ショコラ、バニラ」
[メイプル]: 「あら、それが制服？　可愛いじゃない、馬子にも衣装って感じで」
[シナモン]: 「ショコラちゃんもバニラちゃんも元気そうで良かったぁ」
[シナモン]: 「急にいなくなっちゃうから心配したんだよー？」
[ココナツ]: 「そうだよ、すごくすごく心配したんだよ？」
[ココナツ]: 「嘉祥様に付いてくなら一言言ってくれれば良かったのに」
[ショコラ]: 「あはは、ごめんね？　ついつい勢いでのことだったから」
[バニラ]: 「また会えたから問題ない。みんな元気そうで何より」
[時雨]: 「うんうん。ネコたちも感動の再会を喜んでいるようで何よりですね」
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Yo. It's been a few days, Chocola, Vanilla.」
[Maple]: 「Oh, are those your uniforms? Aren't they cute~ Talk about dressing to suit your body type!」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm glad that you two are doing well.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I got worried when you two suddenly disappeared, you know~?」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah, we were really, really worried!」
[Coconut]: 「You should've just told us you were going with Kashou-sama.」
[Chocola]: 「Ahaha, sorry! It was kind of a spur-of-the-moment thing.」
[Vanilla]: 「If we can see each other again, then it's not a problem. I'm glad that everyone is doing well.」
[Shigure]: 「Mmhmm! Seeing the catgirls having a happy, emotional reunion together is simply the best!」
ModelAnswer:
Azuki: "Hey. It's been a few days, huh, Chocola, Vanilla?"
Maple: "Oh my, is that a uniform? It's so cute—like a costume for a mare."
Cinnamon: "I'm so glad to see Chocola-chan and Vanilla-chan looking healthy!"
Cinnamon: "We were really worried when you suddenly disappeared like that!"
Coconut: "Yeah! We were super, super worried!"
Coconut: "If you were going to stay with Master, you could've at least said something!"
Chocola: "Hehe, sorry! I just got carried away, that's all."
Vanilla: "It's fine now that we're together again. I'm just happy to see everyone looking good."
Shigure: "Mm-hmm. The cats seem to be overjoyed by this touching reunion—just what we wanted."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「シナモンもココナツも、余計な心配掛けてすまなかったな」
[嘉祥]: 「もう今後はこんなことしないから勘弁してくれ」
シナモンとココナツにも頭を下げる。
こうやって実家のネコが全員来てくれて。
今は本当に家族の暖かみがありがたく思える。
[時雨]: 「お父さまの耳には入らないようにしておきますので、ご安心下さい」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。お前には色々と気苦労掛けてすまないな」
[時雨]: 「そんなことは何も」
[時雨]: 「私はいつでも兄さまを見て来ましたし、これからも応援していますから」
小さな両手で俺の手をそっと包んでくれる。
黙って出て行ったことなど一言も口にしないまま。
ただ許してくれるように。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Cinnamon, Coconut, I'm sorry to have worried you guys, too.」
[Kashou]: 「It won't happen again, so please cut me some slack.」
I lowered my head towards Cinnamon and Coconut.
And just like that, all the catgirls in my family were assembled.
I appreciated the warmth of having my family here right now.
[Shigure]: 「I won't let Father know about this, so please don't worry.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, I appreciate it. You've been through a lot, too. Sorry.」
[Shigure]: 「It was nothing.」
[Shigure]: 「I will always come and visit you, Nii-sama. I'll be cheering you on.」
She wrapped her small hands around my hand.
She didn't say anything about me slipping out without telling anyone.
She simply just forgave me.
ModelAnswer:
[Master]: "I'm sorry I worried you both, Cinnamon and Coconut."
[Master]: "I promise I won't do anything like this again, so please forgive me."
He bows his head toward Cinnamon and Coconut.
Having all the cats from my family here like this...
I truly appreciate the warmth of family now.
[Shigure]: "I'll make sure your father doesn't hear about this, so please rest easy."
[Master]: "Yeah, I'm counting on you. I've put you through a lot, I'm sorry."
[Shigure]: "You don't need to say that at all."
[Shigure]: "I've always been watching over my brother, and I'll continue to support you."
She gently wraps her small hands around mine.
Without saying a word about silently leaving.
Just silently asking to be forgiven.

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
時雨が興味深そうに回転台やローラー類、分割器などの器具を見て回る。
もちろん同じものもたくさんあるけども細かいところは違うものが多い。
[時雨]: 「兄さまはこちらでケーキをお作りになるのですね」
[時雨]: 「和装の兄さまも垂涎モノでしたが、パティシエバージョンも女心にきゅんきゅん来るものがあります」
[時雨]: 「ああっ……！　許されることであればライブカメラを設置して、兄さまのお姿を２４時間愛でられるようにしたい……！」
[嘉祥]: 「もちろん許されないからなそれ」
そもそも２４時間ここにいるわけじゃないし。
相変わらず際どい発言をする我が妹だ。
[時雨]: 「でもショコラもバニラも元気そうで安心しました」
reference_answer:
Shigure seemed really intrigued as she looked around at the mixers, rollers, and other tools in the kitchen.
There was a lot of similar equipment, of course, but there were minute differences.
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, this is where you make cakes, isn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「I prefer seeing Nii-sama in traditional Japanese clothing, but I'm sure you in your bakery uniform will make girls' hearts sing, too.」
[Shigure]: 「Ahh...! If I could, I would install a live camera so I could watch my beloved Nii-sama 24/7...!」
[Kashou]: 「There's no way I'd be okay with that.」
Not that there was any way I'd be there baking for 24 hours straight.
As usual, my little sister said some pretty questionable things.
[Shigure]: 「... But I am glad that both Chocola and Vanilla are doing well.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "So this is where you make cakes, onii-sama."
Shigure: "Even though I was tempted by your kimono-clad self, this patissier version of you is equally heart-melting for a woman's heart."
Shigure: "Ah...! If it were allowed, I'd love to install a live camera here and be able to admire your figure 24 hours a day...!"
Kashou: "Of course not allowed."
I'm not even here 24 hours a day to begin with.
My sister, as always, making dangerously suggestive remarks.
Shigure: "But I'm glad both Chocola and Vanilla seem to be doing well."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「でもお店で働かせるのなら、ちゃんと資格を取らせないとですね」
[嘉祥]: 「資格？　調理師免許ってことか？」
[時雨]: 「くすくす。違いますよ、兄さま。そうではなくてですね？」
[時雨]: 「ネコを単独行動させたり従業員として扱うには……」
[時雨]: 「対象のネコに単独行動許可証という資格が必要なのです」
[時雨]: 「許可証なく外を歩いたりしたらば、ネコは警察に補導されてしまいますから」
[時雨]: 「それに許可証なく従業員としては使えません」
[時雨]: 「無料のお手伝い程度ならまた別の話なのですが」
[嘉祥]: 「許可証って……家のネコたちだって、外に出る時にそんなの持ってなかっただろ？」
家のネコたちが時雨の使いで外出する時のことを思い出してみる。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「But if you're going to get them working in this bakery, certain qualifications are necessary.」
[Kashou]: 「Qualifications? Are you talking about a cooking certification?」
[Shigure]: 「Teehee~ Not that, Nii-sama. It isn't that...」
[Shigure]: 「Regarding, allowing catgirls to work independently as employees...」
[Shigure]: 「A catgirl needs to have an "Independent Action Permit" in terms of qualifications.」
[Shigure]: 「Without that permit, a catgirl can be arrested by the police if they are out and about.」
[Shigure]: 「Besides, they can't be employed without that permit.」
[Shigure]: 「Working for free is a different story, though.」
[Kashou]: 「A permit... but our family's catgirls have never had one of those when they leave home, right?」
I tried to remember the times when our family's catgirls went out while under Shigure's watch.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "But if you're going to have her work at the shop, she'll need to properly obtain the necessary qualifications, won't she?"
[Kashou]: "Qualifications? You mean a chef's license?"
[Shigure]: "Kusu kusu. No, that's not it, brother-sama. Not quite."
[Shigure]: "To allow a cat to act independently or treat her as staff..."
[Shigure]: "A special qualification called an 'Independent Movement Permit' is required for the cat in question."
[Shigure]: "Without that permit, if a cat goes out on her own, she'll be escorted back by the police."
[Shigure]: "And she can't be used as staff without the permit either."
[Shigure]: "Of course, helping out for free would be a different matter entirely."
[Kashou]: "An Independent Movement Permit...? Our household cats never had something like that when they went outside, did they?"
Recalling the times when his household cats had gone out on Shigure's errands.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「どうですどうですー？　ご主人さまも嬉しいですかー？」
[バニラ]: 「時雨の兄想いな心にはほんと頭が下がるね」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨えぇえぇええぇぇぇぇぇえぇぇぇえぇーーーーーー！！！！」
色々と新品なものをまさか捨てるわけにもいかず。
こうして俺もファンシーな姫roomで生活する羽目になった。

窓越しに店内の様子を見ると多少なりとも客足が落ち着いてきたようだ。
時計を見るともうすぐ１５時になるかなといったところだった。
……まさか、あの開店日早々売り切れ事件のお陰で評判が上がるとはなぁ。
ブログやらドゥイッターやらの口コミ効果があったらしく次の日から大忙し。
まさかの偶然とは言え、本当に時雨様様だ。

reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「Here is your receipt. Will you be needing some dry ice to keep it cool while you carry it home?」
[Kashou]: 「... All right. Maybe I'll take this moment to bake some more sponge cake for the shortcakes.」
I looked through the window onto the bakery floor and saw that the customer traffic had calmed down a bit.
Glancing at the clock, I saw that it was almost 3 PM.
... It seemed that selling out and closing early on opening day actually got us noticed.
Thanks to some tweets and blog posts, word of mouth had spread and we were really busy the next day.
You could argue that it was just a big coincidence, but this was definitely all because of Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Master! We're almost out of fruit shortcakes! Ah, cream puffs too!」
[Kashou]: 「Got it. I'll start making more now, then.」
[Vanilla]: 「Master, we've received an order for a birthday cake. I'll leave the form over here.」
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "The bill is here. Are you using dry ice?"
Kashou: "……Alright, I'll bake some more sponge for the short cakes while I have the chance."
Looking through the window at the inside of the shop, the number of customers had calmed down somewhat.
Checking the clock, it was just about to reach 3:00 PM.
...I never thought the incident on opening day, when everything sold out immediately, would actually boost our reputation.
Apparently, the word-of-mouth from blogs and Twitter had taken effect, and we've been swamped since the next day.
Even if it was just a coincidence, it's truly thanks to you, Shigure-sama.
Chocola: "Master! The fruit shortcakes are almost gone! Oh, and the cream puffs too!"
Kashou: "Got it. I'll make more right away."
Vanilla: "Master, we got an order for a birthday cake. I've put the order form here."

[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨のお陰様で、予想以上に客足が伸びたこともあるけどな」
[時雨]: 「あら何のことでしょう？」
俺がそれ以上は追求しないことにすると、
時雨も小さく笑って首を傾げて応える。
素直に答えるくらいなら直接言ってるだろうし。
そんなところも昔からの時雨らしさだ。
[時雨]: 「兄さまの仰ることも分かりますが」
[時雨]: 「でもネコは賢い子たちですから。人間の家族にも、パートナーにもなれるくらいに」
[時雨]: 「……だからこそ」
そこで一呼吸を置いて。
困ったような笑顔を浮かべて俺を見る。
[時雨]: 「……自分にも頼ってもらえないのは、きっと寂しいことだと思いますよ？」
その笑顔に胸がズキリと痛む。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Thanks to Shigure, we've seen more customers than we expected."  
Minaduki Shigure: "Oh? What are you talking about?"  
When I decide not to press further,  
Shigure softly smiles and tilts her head in response.  
If she were going to answer honestly, she'd just say it directly.  
That's just like the old Shigure.  
Minaduki Shigure: "I understand what my brother-sama says."  
Minaduki Shigure: "But cats are clever creatures. They can become family, partners to humans."  
Minaduki Shigure: "……That's precisely why"  
She pauses for a breath.  
She gives me a faint, pained smile.  
Minaduki Shigure: "……I think it must be lonely, not being someone you can rely on."  
My chest aches sharply at that smile.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
Frowning at the phone screen.  
Gazing at the motionless Shigure, Kashou deduces the caller.  
[Master]: "It's from home, isn't it? You'd better answer it soon."  
[Shigure]: "……I already know that, even without being told. I left without informing them of my destination."  
Shigure's phone stops ringing.  
Silently, Shigure grips the phone tightly in her hand.  
[Shigure]: "…Is it because I'm still just a girl who hasn't even reached adulthood?"  
[Shigure]: "Or because I'm a naive child, ignorant of the world?"  
[Shigure]: "…So I must obey what my father and mother say, then?"  
[Shigure]: "…I want to stay here."  
[Shigure]: "Even if it's just… at least being by your side when you're suffering, brother-sama…"

Question:
[バニラ]: 「他の病院の場所は知らないし……道を聞ける人も、歩いてない……」
[バニラ]: 「でも、このまま帰るわけにも行かないし……どうしたら……」
不安でぎゅっと手を握り合う。
冷たいシャッターを見上げて下唇をきゅっと噛む。
[警察]: 「キミたち、何してるの？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ……警察さん！」
[ショコラ]: 「開いてる病院教えてもらえませんか！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまが大変で！　それで、お医者さん呼ぼうと思って！」
[バニラ]: 「病院が休みで、どうすればいいか分からなくて……」
[警察]: 「飼い主さんが？　それは大変だけど……」
[警察]: 「キミたち鈴は？　持ってないの？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「あっ……！」
指摘されて首元に手を当てる。
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」
[Chocola]: 「Master is in trouble, so we wanted to get a doctor!」
[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」
[Police Officer]: 「Your Master is? That's a quite a problem, but...」
[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "I don't know where any other hospitals are... and there's no one around to ask for directions..."
Vanilla: "But I can't just go back like this... what should I do..."
Clutching her hands tightly in anxiety.
Gazing up at the cold shutter, biting her lower lip tightly.
Police: "What are you two doing?"
Chocola: "Ah... police officer!"
Chocola: "Can you tell us where a hospital is open!?"
Chocola: "My master is in serious trouble! We were trying to call a doctor!"
Vanilla: "The hospital is closed, and we don't know what to do..."
Police: "Your master? That's serious, but..."
Police: "You two, the bell? Don't you have it with you?"
Chocola & Vanilla: "Ah...!"  
Touching their necks, pointed out.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
朝イチから予想外の光景に頭がついて来てくれない。
[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
My head can't keep up with the unexpected sight first thing in the morning.  
[Shigure]: "Good morning, Onii-sama."  
[Shigure]: "I've been thinking a lot about everything that's happened recently."  
A bright, unclouded smile.  
The other cats are all smiling at me too.  
I feel a cold sweat trickle down,  
[Kashou]: "Hah... thinking about what, exactly...?"  
I manage to say only that much.  
[Shigure]: "Now I understand that asking Onii-sama not to push yourself is itself impossible."  
[Shigure]: "But it's also true that I, as your younger sister, was so worried I couldn't sleep at night..."  
[Shigure]: "Therefore, I've concluded that the best solution is to increase our personnel, so as to reduce Onii-sama's burden."  
[Kashou]: "…………Hah"

[Coconut]: "Haguhaguhaguhaguhaguhaguhaguhaguh..."

Question:

言いながら、時雨がラッピングされた小箱を取りだした。

[時雨]: 「写真立てです。前に、大きいのが欲しいとおっしゃっていたので」

reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Hah... The dishes are good for sure, but this tea... Such a heavenly aroma~ The flavor is bursting in my mouth. Your tea choices are second to none, May-chan♪」
[Maple]: 「Tea leaves with a rich aroma suit a party atmosphere well. Today, I went with a champagne flavor.」
[Maple]: 「And with a glass teapot, you get to enjoy the sight of the flower petals mixed with the tea leaves dancing around in the water.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Fantastic~ Absolutely fantastic, May-chan~♪ Cinnamon is drooliiiing~...!」
[Shigure]: 「Mother, I'd like to say it once more: Happy birthday to you.」
Shigure pulls out a small gift-wrapped box as she speaks.
[Awayuki]: 「My, my, what could it be?」
[Shigure]: 「A picture frame. I got it because you mentioned that you wanted a big one before.」
[Awayuki]: 「My, oh my, this is wonderful! Are you sure? Are you positive? Thank you, Shigure!」
ModelAnswer:
[Cinnamon]: "Haa... cooking's good too, but this tea... amazing aroma~. A burst of flavor, just as expected from Mea-chan's choice♪"
[Maple]: "A strong-scented tea pairs perfectly with parties. Today's flavor is champagne."
[Maple]: "With a glass teapot, you can also enjoy watching the petals inside the tea leaves dance in the hot water."
[Cinnamon]: "Best~♪ Best ever, Mea-chan~♪ Cinnamon's getting all moist... uwaaah~..."
[Shigure]: "Mother-sama, once again—happy birthday to you."
As she spoke, Shigure took out a wrapped small box.
[Awayuki]: "Ah, what's this?"
[Shigure]: "It's a photo frame. I remembered you mentioned wanting a larger one before."
[Awayuki]: "Oh my, how sweet! Is it really okay? Is it really okay? Thank you, Shigure!"

Question:
[淡雪]: 「昔から、嘉祥は１つのことに夢中になると、他のことを忘れてしまうんだから」
[嘉祥]: 「返す言葉もない」
[淡雪]: 「いいのよ、嘉祥はケーキ屋さんなんだから。ケーキが一番のプレゼントだわ」
[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってもらえると……。でも、近いうちに持ってくるよ」
[淡雪]: 「そう？　楽しみにしているわ」
[時雨]: 「それでは、ちょっと予定と違いますが、ケーキを出しましょうか」
[ショコラ]: 「わーい！　ご主人さまのケーキにゃ！」
[ココナツ]: 「ケーキ！　ぼ、ぼく、持ってくるよ！！」
[バニラ]: 「待った、ココナツ。落ちついて。ステイ」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「You've always been the type to forget about everything else when you get focused on one thing, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know what to say.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, it's fine. You're a cake baker, Kashou. A cake is the best present I could ask for.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm glad to hear you say that... Still, I'll bring you a proper present sometime soon.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, really? Then, I look forward to it.」
[Shigure]: 「Well then, it deviates from my plans slightly, but why don't we bring out the cake now?」
[Chocola]: 「Yay! It's time for Master's cake, nya!」
[Coconut]: 「Cake! I-I volunteer to bring it out!」
[Vanilla]: 「Hold it, Coconut. Down, girl. Stay.」
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Awayuki]: "Ever since long ago, Kashou gets so absorbed in one thing that he forgets about everything else."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I have no words to say in reply."  
[Minaduki Awayuki]: "It's fine, Kashou is a cake shop owner after all. A cake is the best present."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "When you say that... I'll bring one soon."  
[Minaduki Awayuki]: "Really? I'm looking forward to it."  
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Then, though it's a bit off schedule, shall we serve the cake?"  
[Chocola]: "Yay! The master's cake!"  
[Coconut]: "Cake! I-I'll bring it!"  
[Vanilla]: "Hold on, Coconut. Calm down. Stay."

Question:
お客さんからお褒めの言葉をもらうことはあるが、母親から言われると妙に照れてしまう。
ネコたちも、瞳を輝かせていた。
[ショコラ]: 「ステキですにゃ、ご主人さま～！」
[バニラ]: 「良い」
[アズキ]: 「まぁ、アタシは手伝ったから、完成品を見てっけどな」
[メイプル]: 「気合い入ってるわね」
[シナモン]: 「お、おいしそう～……じゅるり」
[ココナツ]: 「すごい……かわいい。食べちゃうのがもったいないくらいだよ！」
[淡雪]: 「ほんと。切ってしまうのが、もったいないわねー」
[淡雪]: 「ずっと部屋に飾っておきたいくらい」
[時雨]: 「わかります、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「でしょう？」
reference_answer:
I've certainly gotten compliments from customers before, but getting one from my own mother is making me blush, oddly enough.
All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.
[Chocola]: 「That is so lovely, Master~!」
[Vanilla]: 「Very good.」
[Azuki]: 「I mean, I helped with it, but call me curious to see the finished product.」
[Maple]: 「You really went all out.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I-It looks so delicious~... Slurp.」
[Coconut]: 「Amazing... It's so cute. It almost feels like a shame to eat it!」
[Awayuki]: 「It really does. Cutting into it feels almost criminal.」
[Awayuki]: 「I want to just keep it as a room decoration forever.」
[Shigure]: 「I know how you feel, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「Right?」
ModelAnswer:
I sometimes receive praise from customers, but hearing it from my mother makes me strangely flustered.  
The cats' eyes sparkled with delight.  
[Chocola]: "It's wonderful, Master~!"  
[Vanilla]: "Good."  
[Azuki]: "Well, I helped, so I got to see the finished product, you know."  
[Maple]: "You put real effort into this."  
[Cinnamon]: "Mmm, it looks delicious... slurp."  
[Coconut]: "Incredible... so cute. It's almost a shame to eat it!"  
[Awayuki]: "Really. It's a shame to cut it."  
[Awayuki]: "I'd love to keep it displayed in my room forever."  
[Shigure]: "I understand, Mother-sama!"  
[Awayuki]: "Isn't that right?"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「それだと食べられないので……切りますよ？」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。仕方ありません、やってください、メイプル」
[メイプル]: 「さくさくさく、っと」
メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」
[淡雪]: 「なんだか、ネコたちも、ずいぶん手慣れたわね。包丁の扱いがプロみたいだわ」
[時雨]: 「お店で働いてますから、もうプロですよ、母様」
[淡雪]: 「あら、そうよね！　うふふ……頼もしいわね」
ケーキが切り分け終わった、そのときだった――
玄関のほうから、扉が開く音がする。
[時雨]: 「えっ！？」
[淡雪]: 「あら、この開け方は、お父さまねぇ。今日は早く帰ってきたみたい」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We won't be able to eat it if it spoils, so... it has to get cut.」
[Shigure]: 「You're right. It's a necessary evil. Please, do the deed, Maple.」
[Maple]: 「All right, slice, slice, slice.」
Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my...」
[Awayuki]: 「Seems the catgirls have become quite skilled themselves. She's handling the knife like a professional.」
[Shigure]: 「They all work in the shop, so they are professionals, Mother.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my, that's right! Tee hee hee... Such reliable girls.」
Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—
From the foyer, the sound of the door opening echoes.
[Shigure]: 「Huh?!」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, that sounds like your father opening the door. He must be back early today.」
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "If that's the case, I'll just cut it then?"
[Shigure]: "Yes, I suppose so. Go ahead, Maple."
[Maple]: "Sakusaku saku, got it!"
Maple inserts the knife into the cake and quickly slices it into pieces.
[Awayuki]: "Ah~..."
[Awayuki]: "It's funny... the cats seem to be quite experienced. Their handling of the knife is almost professional."
[Shigure]: "They work at the shop, so they're already professionals, Mother-sama."
[Awayuki]: "Ah, that's right! Hehe... they're quite reliable, aren't they?"
Just as the cake was finished being cut—  
A door opening sound came from the front entrance.  
[Shigure]: "Eh!?"
[Awayuki]: "Ah, that way of opening the door... it's Father. He must have come home early today."

Question:
俺は緊張して身を固くする。
ネコたちも息を呑んだ。
[州浜]: 「…………ふん」
この男が、俺の父親――水無月州浜だ。
[時雨]: 「あの、父様……今夜は、商工会の寄合だったはずでは……？」
[州浜]: 「そうだが……私が帰宅すると、不都合でも？」
[時雨]: 「そ、そんなことは……」
[ショコラ]: 「あの！　ご主人さまのお父さま、お帰りなさーい！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人のお父上、予想外にお早いご帰宅」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お父さま、お帰りなさいませ！」
[州浜]: 「うむ」
[メイプル]: 「……これ、やばいんじゃないかしら？」
reference_answer:
My body freezes up from the tension.
The catgirls are also taken aback.
[Suhama]: 「...Hmph.」
This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.
[Shigure]: 「Um, Father... I thought you had a community chamber get-together to attend tonight...?」
[Suhama]: 「I did. Is there something wrong with me coming back home?」
[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master's Father, you have returned earlier than we anticipated.」
[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
I stiffen with nervousness.  
The cats hold their breath.  

[Suhama]: "…………hmm"  
This man is my father—Minaduki Suhama.  

[Shigure]: "Um, Father… wasn't tonight the chamber of commerce meeting…?"  

[Suhama]: "That's true… but is it a problem that I've returned home?"  

[Shigure]: "N-no, of course not…"  

[Chocola]: "Oh! Master's father, welcome back!"  

[Vanilla]: "Master's father, you're home earlier than expected."  

[Coconut]: "F-father, welcome home!"  

[Suhama]: "Hmph."  

[Maple]: "……This is bad, isn't it?"

Question:

[淡雪]: 「お父さま、座ってはどうかしら。嘉祥のケーキ、とっても美味しそうでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「あ、そうです！　父様、今日こそ兄様のケーキを食べてください！」
[時雨]: 「食べてみれば、兄様が本気で打ちこんでいるってわかるはずです！」
俺は思わず息を呑んだ。父親が、俺の作ったケーキを食べるだろうか？
何と言うだろうか？
[ショコラ]: 「賛成です！　ご主人さまの美味しいケーキを食べれば、みんな仲良しにゃのです！」
[バニラ]: 「間違いない」
[ココナツ]: 「うんうん！　お兄ちゃんのケーキ、本当に美味しいんだから！」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「I'm so glad that you did. It hasn't been this lively in quite some time, after all.」
[Awayuki]: 「Father, why not take a seat? Kashou's cake looks quite good, doesn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, yes! Father, today should be the day you partake in one of Nii-sama's cakes!」
[Shigure]: 「If you do, you will realize that Nii-sama has really devoted his all toward baking it!」
I find myself taken aback. Would Dad consider eating a cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: 「Chocola agrees! One bite of Master's delicious cake and everyone gets alyong!」
[Vanilla]: 「Without a shadow of a doubt.」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah! Yeah! Onii-chan's cakes are really good, after all!」
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Awayuki]: "I'm so happy. It's been a long time since we've had such a lively atmosphere."
[Minaduki Awayuki]: "Father, why don't you sit down? Kashou's cake looks absolutely delicious, doesn't it?"
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Ah, yes! Father-sama, today is the day you must try your eldest son's cake!"
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Just take a bite, and you'll understand how seriously your son has poured his heart into it!"
I couldn't help but hold my breath. Would my father actually eat the cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: "I agree! If Father-sama eats the delicious cake made by our master, everyone will get along just fine!"
[Vanilla]: "Absolutely."
[Coconut]: "Yeah, yeah! My big brother's cake is really, really delicious!"

Question:

いろいろなことが頭の中で駆け巡り、思考がごちゃごちゃになった。

[嘉祥]: 「あ……」

reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」
[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
I left the Minaduki house, as if fleeing.
A whirlwind of thoughts raced through my mind, my thoughts all jumbled.
Before I realized it, I was in a nighttime park.

[Minaduki Kashou]: "Ah..."
I'd left behind my house key, my wallet—everything—inside my bag.

[Minaduki Kashou]: "…What am I doing, me?"

[Chocola]: "…Master-sama"

[Minaduki Kashou]: "Chocola…!"

[Vanilla]: "Master, you forgot something."

In Vanilla's hand was my bag.

[Minaduki Kashou]: "You brought it, Vanilla?"

[Vanilla]: "Of course. Sleeping outdoors would be troublesome."

[Minaduki Kashou]: "That's true."

Without the key, neither I nor the two of them could get back inside.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I had something I wanted to ask my supplier. It's not urgent, but I should call them sooner rather than later."
Minaduki Kashou: "It's common practice for a small, family-run patisserie, but I handle negotiations with each supplier myself."
Minaduki Kashou: "Even ingredients not available through general distribution can be sourced in bulk from certain farms."
Minaduki Kashou: "The pursuit of flavor was also a journey to find the right ingredients."
Minaduki Kashou: "Since everyone else is enjoying the tourist buzz, it would be rude to talk business, so I excused myself, saying I had personal matters."
Minaduki Kashou: "Just to be safe, I left the inn and chose a quiet spot to talk."
Minaduki Kashou: "I make the call."
Minaduki Kashou: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Fuu……"
Minaduki Kashou: "They were surprised to hear from overseas, but it seems they'll manage to ship it after all."
Minaduki Kashou: "I return to the inn."

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「I wasn't able to see the ball again. Catgirls really are something else.」

[Vanilla]: 「And Chocola tries to catch the ball with her hands.」
[Kashou]: 「Interesting.」
So Chocola and Cinnamon went somewhere else while these two duked it out in ping-pong, then.
[Kashou]: 「Now that I think of it, seeing you two together is a rare sight.」

So Chocola and Cinnamon must have gone off somewhere else, leaving just the two of them to battle it out.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Hmm, let's try one."

Bought a steaming hot yudofu manjuu from a street stall.  
Freshly made and piping hot.  
Taking a bite, it's plump and moist, with a texture softer than I expected.  
The filling crumbles delicately on the tongue, spreading a rich sweetness.  

Kashou: "Ah, I see... hoho... this is delicious."  
Neither my Western pastries nor the traditional sweets from my family home are ever served warm.  
Eating a hot manjuu while murmuring hoho is an experience in itself.  

Kashou: "Come to think of it, I've visited this hot spring town several times before... but I've never tried this."  
Back then, there were no cats.  
Even when we four—my parents, Shigure, and I—went on trips together, we never talked about buying snacks on the go.

metadata:

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Hey, you're here, Shigure. Did you need something?"
[Shigure]: "No, I'm fine now."
[Kashou]: "Wait, was it work-related phone call, Shigure?"
[Shigure]: "...Y-yes. I'm sorry. Interrupting your trip like this..."
[Kashou]: "No need to apologize. La Soleil is closed today, but the rest of the world isn't."
Though I didn't ask for details, Shigure seems to run a company.
She uses her income to buy clothes for the cats, and even funds the bell carrier exam.
Father is strict with me, but he's soft on his younger sister Shigure—letting her do whatever she wants, with the cats and her business alike.
[Kashou]: "The cats were having their own fun. Table tennis, games... even the shop."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それはよかったです。……兄様、たまには兄妹水入らずで遊びませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いいけど、何する？」

そういうことになった。
[時雨]: 「それでは、兄様への想いを込めて……」
歌いはじめると、雰囲気が一変した。
[時雨]: 「～～～♪」
[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」
[時雨]: 「はぁ～、ひさしぶりに大きな声を出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "That's good. ...Brother, how about we spend some time together, just the two of us, without any distractions?"  
[Kashou]: "Sure, but what should we do?"  
[Shigure]: "I heard there's a karaoke room here?"  
[Kashou]: "Karaoke... I only went once in high school. Shigure, can you sing?"  
[Shigure]: "I did choir as a child, so I can manage a little."  
That's how it came to be.  
[Shigure]: "Then, I'll sing this with all my feelings for you, Brother..."  
As she began to sing, the atmosphere completely changed.  
[Shigure]: "～～～♪"  
[Kashou]: "……incredible"  
[Shigure]: "Ahh~ I haven't sung so loudly in ages"  
[Kashou]: "You're way too good!"  
Honestly, it was pro-level. I gave her my fullest applause.

橋から下を眺める。
暗闇だ。

Yeah, I don't think I can get to sleep.
I exit the room, careful not to make a sound on the way out.
The inn has its lamps on at night, but once I leave the area, I'm greeted by rural darkness.
Depending on the spot, it's dark enough that I can't even tell where it is I'm standing.
This hot spring district is usually bustling with tourists during the day, but in the wee hours of the night, it has a completely different atmosphere.
I peer down from the bridge.
Darkness.
All I can hear is the sound of the running river.
I feel I can make out the moon's reflection on the water's surface... No, wait, is that just a street light?
I peer deeper below the bridge to confirm.

Still couldn't seem to fall asleep.  
I carefully made no sound as I left the room.  
The inn had a night lamp, but once I stepped away from it, it was the countryside at night.  
In some places, the darkness was so thick you couldn't even see your own feet.  
The hot spring town, bustling with tourists during the day, had completely changed its atmosphere at night.  
I looked down from the bridge.  
Darkness.  
Only the sound of flowing water from the river could be heard.  
The moon's reflection seemed to shimmer on the river's surface... no, was that just the glow of a streetlight?  
Curious, I peered down beneath the bridge.

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」
[Azuki]: 「Are the convenience store sweets still what's buggin' you?」
[Kashou]: 「No, no. I'm good on that front now.」
[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」
ModelAnswer:
[Azuki]: "There weren't any outdoor shoes, you know. Not exactly normal, doing this kind of thing in the middle of the night, huh?"
[Kashou]: "I'm sorry... I really just wanted a change of pace."
[Azuki]: "Is it still about the convenience store sweets?"
[Kashou]: "No, no, that's definitely fine now."
[Kashou]: "I was just thinking back on everything... wondering what it is I'm missing, you know?"
[Azuki]: "About your past, Kashou?"
[Kashou]: "…After graduating university, I went to study in France."
[Kashou]: "I couldn't just go back and take over the family business with no other options. I just wanted to broaden my horizons."
[Kashou]: "But please don't misunderstand... I don't actually dislike Watamuki's wagashi, okay?"

reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Huh...?」

[Kashou]: 「I absolutely hate feeling that way, but... I'm aware of the fact that I've been losing my composure.」

[Kashou]: 「Even though I really hate that idea...」

[Kashou]: 「I'm sorry...」

[Kashou]: "And yet, I truly hate that feeling..."

Question:
[シナモン]: 「だって、苦しいから～……苦しすぎて、だから……言いたくないことも、口から出ちゃうって……」

[シナモン]: 「嘉祥さんはぁ……ぐすっ……泣いていいんです～……っ。だって、悲しいんですから～」

reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「I mean, you're in pain~... You're in so much pain, and that's why... you ended up saying what you didn't want to say...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Unghh... Not being able to say what you want to say... and saying what you don't want to say...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Either way... sniffle... I understand... Unghh... It's so sad~... It's so very saaad~...!」
[Kashou]: 「Cinnamon... I'm sorry...」
[Cinnamon]: 「D-Don't apologize... please. You aren't in the wrong here, Kashou-saaan~...!」
[Cinnamon]: 「Kashou-san, youuu... sniffle... you can let it out and cry~...! It is sad, after all~」
[Kashou]: 「I...」
I see. So this is sad?
My lack of skills is sad... The disappointment of my hard work going unrewarded is sad...
[Maple]: 「Khh... It makes me want to cry, too...」
ModelAnswer:
[Cinnamon]: "But it's painful... so painful, I can't help it... even things I don't want to say come out of my mouth..."
[Cinnamon]: "Uuu... the feeling of wanting to say something... the feeling of being unable to say it... the feeling of wanting to say something I don't want to say..."
[Cinnamon]: "Both... gus... I understand... uuu... it's so sad... it's really so sad...!"
[Kashou]: "Cinnamon... I'm sorry..."
[Cinnamon]: "No, please don't apologize... You're not at fault at all...!"
[Cinnamon]: "You can... gus... cry, you know... It's okay... because you're sad..."
[Kashou]: "I am..."
So that's it. This is sadness.
The helplessness of my own strength... the disappointment that my efforts go unrewarded...
[Maple]: "Guh... I can't help it... I'm about to cry too..."

[嘉祥]: 「いや……パリでも、そんな貴族みたいなドレス姿は、そうそう見かけないんだが……」
パリは石畳の道が多く、階段を使うことも多く、ハイヒールは転倒の危険がある。女性でもスニーカーや革靴を履く者が多い。
そして、スリムなジーンズをはいている女性は多く、スカート姿の女性は珍しい。
服の色は黒か白だ。ベージュや柄物のアウターを着ているのは、おおねむ観光客だった。
[時雨]: 「残念です……完璧だと思ったのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、まぁ……その格好も似合ってるから、いいんじゃないか？」
reference_answer:
Yeah, as if! Not even I would mistake someone else for my little sister.
[Kashou]: 「What are you doing here, Shigure...?」
[Shigure]: 「...So, you ended up finding me, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「I was trying to perfectly blend in with the local people.」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Even in Paris, you don't really see people running around with such an aristocratic-looking dress.」
Paris is full of stone-paved roads and you're often climbing stairs, so wearing high-heels is risky. Even the majority of ladies wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, most girls wear slim jeans, so girls in skirts are rare.
Their clothes are usually black or white. Mostly anyone wearing beige or patterned outerwear is a tourist.
[Shigure]: 「How unfortunate... I thought it was perfect...」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Your outfit looks nice on you, so it's fine, right?」
ModelAnswer:
You've got to be kidding! Even I wouldn't mistake my own sister.

[嘉祥]: "What are you doing, Shigure...?"

[時雨]: "……I've been found out. Brother."

[時雨]: "I thought I'd blended in perfectly with the locals."

[嘉祥]: "No... Even in Paris, you don't see someone dressed like a noblewoman every day."

Paris has many cobblestone streets and lots of stairs, making high heels dangerous to walk in. Even women often wear sneakers or leather shoes.

And many women wear slim jeans, so seeing someone in a skirt is rare.

Their clothes are mostly black or white. Those wearing beige or patterned outerwear were clearly just sleepy tourists.

[時雨]: "That's disappointing... I thought I was perfect."

[嘉祥]: "No, well... You actually look good in that outfit, so it's not so bad."

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」

How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.

[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」

Minaduki Kashou: "Even in ordinary households, dinner is served like this—salad, soup, bread, fish dish, meat dish, cheese, dessert... you know, a full course."
How many dishes are served varies from household to household.

Minaduki Shigure: "Hmm, hmm... I see... I see..."

Minaduki Kashou: "No, no... to someone from another country, even typical Japanese home cooking would seem like kaiseki cuisine."

Minaduki Shigure: "Now that you mention it...!"

It's a fresh yet nostalgic taste.

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「……私は、嘉祥のお父さんではないから、わからないわね。そうかもしれないし、違うのかもしれない」
[ベニエ]: 「言葉というのは、言った本人にすら、本当の意味がわからないこともある」
[ベニエ]: 「１００人が受け取れば、１００通りの解釈があるのが、言葉というものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「大切なのは言葉ではなくて……」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……少し話しすぎたわね」
[ベニエ]: 「長旅のうえに、ずっと働いて疲れたでしょう。シャワーを浴びて、早めに寝るといいわ」
[ベニエ]: 「あ……うっかりしていたわ。空き部屋はあるけれど、ベッドは嘉祥が使っていたものしか空いてないの」
[ベニエ]: 「一緒に使ってもらってもいいかしら？」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「...I'm not your father, so I don't know. Your hunch could be right, or you it could be wrong.」
[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "……I'm not Kashou's father, so I can't say for sure. It might be true, or it might not be."
[Beignet]: "Words sometimes don't even hold their true meaning for the person who speaks them."
[Beignet]: "That's what words are—when 100 people receive them, there are 100 different interpretations."
[Beignet]: "What's important isn't the words themselves……"
[Beignet]: "No… I've talked too much."
[Beignet]: "After such a long journey and working nonstop, you must be exhausted. You should take a shower and go to bed early."
[Beignet]: "Ah… I nearly forgot. There is an empty room, but the only bed available is the one Kashou used to use."
[Beignet]: "Would it be alright if you shared it with me?"

[Minaduki Shigure]: "Ugh... I'm so happy... I think I'm going to faint."

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」
[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "You must have been taking good care of it frequently. Rooms deteriorate quickly if they're not used."

Kashou: "Now that you mention it..."

Shigure: "If you don't open the windows every day and wipe away the dust, it starts to smell musty right away."

Kashou: "Is that so?"

Shigure: "My brother's room back home is always in perfect condition because I take care of it every single day."

Shigure: "I open the windows to refresh the air, wipe down the desk, and check the comfort of the bed."

Kashou: "S-so that's how it is..."

The bed's comfort really needs to be checked every day...?

Shigure: "I think Beignet has probably been waiting all this time for my brother to come back."

Kashou: "Is that right..."

[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I am just so thrilled that I forgot human speech for a second.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, you did work hard today.」
[Shigure]: 「You are too kind. Especially considering I tagged along of my own accord.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sweat it. I came here of my own accord too, so we're in the same boat.」
ModelAnswer:

[Minaduki Shigure]: "Eh, together in the shower!? T-That's... I-I'm not... ready... yet..."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "There's no way you're not ready. Hurry up and get in."
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Haii~"
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Nya~o♪ Nya? Nyaoun?"

[Minaduki Shigure]: "I'm sorry. I got so happy I forgot how to speak human."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Well, today was tiring. Good job."

[Minaduki Kashou]: "It's fine... I came here on my own, too."

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I've been working longer than you, yet you're already so efficient."
Fraise: "Master is meticulous in every detail. I want to learn from you."
Minaduki Kashou: "Is that so?"
Fraise: "You do tend to space out from time to time..."
Minaduki Kashou: "Ugh..."
Fraise: "Right now, Master seems troubled. There must be so many things you need to think about..."
Fraise: "I heard a little about the situation from the pastry chef."
Minaduki Kashou: "Even so, zoning out during work isn't an excuse."
Fraise: "Then I'll work extra hard to make up for it."
Minaduki Kashou: "I don't even know what to say..."
Sorry, ashamed. Of course, the strongest feeling is gratitude.

[Shigure]: "Fellow admirers of your brother, we're comrades now, Fraise!"
[Fraise]: "Y-yes... I don't think I'm as devoted as Shigure-san, though..."
[Shigure]: "No need to be modest. Now, be honest."
[Fraise]: "I really don't feel that way at all...!"
[Shigure]: "Well then, right now I'm offering a special service—your brother's sleeping face photocard!"
[Fraise]: "Huh? What? Sleeping face...?"
[Kashou]: "Hey, Shigure...?"
[Beignet]: "Fufu..."

Question:
[フレーズ]: 「大変です、お兄さん！　外に行列が……！」
[嘉祥]: 「おお……昨日に増して、すごいお客さんの数になってるな。まるで、クリスマスじゃないか」
[時雨]: 「元から知る人ぞ知る名店でしたが、ＳＮＳでさらに火が点いたのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「人事みたいに言うな」
[時雨]: 「すみません。まさか、ここまでの効果があるとは」
[フレーズ]: 「時雨さん……やりすぎだと思います」
[時雨]: 「なにを言っているんですか、フレーズ？　私だけが理由では、ありませんよ」
[時雨]: 「あなたのことも、とっても話題になっています。ほら！　ここにも、ほら！」
時雨が突き出したスマホには、フレーズを賞讃する言葉が並んでいた。
会いに行く、と宣言しているお客さんが何人もいる。おそらく、店の前にできた行列の中に……
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Big trouble, Onii-san! There is a line outside...!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, we've got even more customers than we did yesterday. It's looking a lot like Christmas over here.」
[Shigure]: 「This shop has always been a popular spot among those in the know, but the social media presence seems to have sparked a bigger flame.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't talk like you didn't start it.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I never thought that it would prove this effective.」
[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san... I think you may have overdid it.」
[Shigure]: 「What are you even saying, Fraise? I am not the only cause here.」
[Shigure]: 「You have become the hot topic yourself. Look! Right here, see?」
Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.
There are even some customers stating they're explicitly coming to see her. Most likely standing in that line outside the shop...
ModelAnswer:
[Fraise]: "It's a crisis, onii-san! There's a line outside...!"
[Kashou]: "Oh... the number of customers has increased even more than yesterday. It's like Christmas."
[Shigure]: "It was already a well-known shop among those who knew about it, but it seems the buzz has really spread through SNS."
[Kashou]: "Don't say it like it's some kind of personnel issue."
[Shigure]: "I'm sorry. I never thought it would have such an effect."
[Fraise]: "Shigure-san... I think you've gone too far."
[Shigure]: "What are you talking about, Fraise? It's not just me. You're getting a lot of attention too. Look! Here, look!"
On the smartphone Shigure thrust forward, words praising Fraise were lined up.
Several customers had declared they were coming to visit. Probably among the people lined up in front of the shop...

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「もう今日は閉めるしかないな」
[時雨]: 「最後は撮影会みたいになっていましたね」
[フレーズ]: 「……カメラ、こわいです」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「N-No way! I can't! I don't like that... I don't like being the center of attention!」
[Shigure]: 「Everyone is like that at first. You will come to like it in time.」
[Fraise]: 「I don't think I'd like turning out like you, Shigure-san...」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise...?」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, Fraise, save the chit-chat for later. Let's get working so we don't keep these customers waiting!」
[Shigure]: 「R-Right!」
[Fraise]: 「...Very well, Onii-san. I'll do my best!」
[Beignet]: 「Sorry. We're all out of ingredients.」

[Shigure]: 「It turned into more of a photo session toward the end.」

[Shigure]: "Everyone feels that way at first. You'll get used to it, and it'll even feel good."
[Fraise]: "I don't want to end up like you, Shigure-san..."
[Shigure]: "Fraise...?"

[Shigure]: "Y-yes, sir!"

[Kashou]: "Looks like we have no choice but to close for the day."

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「ちょっと疲れたから、休ませてもらうわ」

[時雨＆フレーズ]: 「わかりましたわかりました」
掃除しながら、フレーズが時雨へと話しかける。
[フレーズ]: 「あの……」
[時雨]: 「なんでしょう？」

[時雨]: 「あんなこと？」
reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Thank you for the fine service, Mentor. I will take care of cleaning up.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, so will I.」
[Fraise]: 「Please, leave cleanup to us, Pâtissière.」
[Beignet]: 「Thank all of you.」
[Kashou]: 「All right, I'll clean up the kitchen. I'll leave the counter and storefront to you guys.」
[Shigure&Fraise]: 「Understood.
As they clean, Fraise addresses Shigure.
[Fraise]: 「Um, excuse me...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, what is it?」
[Fraise]: 「At lunch... I was so overcome with emotion that I blurted that out, but...」
[Shigure]: 「Blurted what out?」
ModelAnswer:

Minaduki Kashou: "You've worked hard, Master. I'll handle the cleanup."
Minaduki Shigure: "Ah, me too."
Fraise: "Leave the rest to me, Pastry Chef."
Beignet: "Thank you, everyone."

Minaduki Shigure & Fraise: "Understood, understood."
As they clean, Fraise speaks to Shigure.

Minaduki Shigure: "What about lunch?"
Fraise: "I got so excited that I ended up saying something like that..."

metadata:
