Question:
昨夜に続き、師匠が手料理を振る舞ってくれる。
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……食事を楽しんでちょうだい」
[時雨]: 「はい！」
[フレーズ]: 「パティシエールの作る料理は、どれも美味しいですが、お兄さんと時雨さんがいるときは特別ですね」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……つい張り切ってしまうわね」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」
昨夜と同じく、とても素晴らしい夕飯だった。
食後――テーブルには、珈琲が並んでいる。
[ベニエ]: 「今日は、大盛況だったわね」
[フレーズ]: 「本当に、そうです。あんなにお客さんが来るなんて……」
reference_answer:
In a follow up to last night, Mentor treats us to her home cooking.
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... I hope you enjoy the meal.」
[Shigure]: 「I will!」
[Fraise]: 「Your cooking is always amazing, Pâtissière, but with Onii-san and Shigure-san around, you go the extra mile.」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... I just can't help myself.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
Just like last night, we have a spectacular dinner.
After the meal — cups of coffee line the table.
[Beignet]: 「The shop sure was bustling today.」
[Fraise]: 「It really was. I never expected THAT many customers...」
ModelAnswer:
The mentor serves us homemade dishes once again, just as he did last night.  
[Beignet]: "Fufu... enjoy your meal"  
[Shigure]: "Yes!"  
[Fraise]: "All the pastries made by the pastry chef are delicious, but they taste especially good when you and Shigure are here"  
[Beignet]: "Fufu... I just get carried away sometimes"  
[Kashou]: "Thank you"  
As splendid as last night's dinner, it was truly wonderful.  
After the meal—coffee is laid out on the table.  
[Beignet]: "Today was a great success, wasn't it?"  
[Fraise]: "Truly, it was. I never thought we'd have so many guests..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "There's no doubt about it. The widespread attention led many people to investigate, and the overwhelming consensus was that it was a renowned establishment. That's the synergistic effect."

[Kashou]: "As for me, I'm happy that more people got to know your wonderful cake, Master."

[Fraise]: "Uuuu... If it's going to be like this tomorrow, it might be a bit difficult."

[Beignet]: "Today was special, that's for sure."

[Beignet]: "I don't think we'll have a line like this tomorrow."

[Fraise]: "That's right... Tomorrow, it'll just be the patissier and me again."

We were scheduled to leave tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is seven hours. To return home within the promised three days, we had to depart at just the right time.

In the end, I still didn't understand what was missing in myself.

Emotionally, I felt much lighter...

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「あ、すみません……」
[ベニエ]: 「結局、お役に立てなかったわね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、そんなことは！」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……まぁ……まだ、父親の言う芯ってのは、よくわかっていません」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、この場所へ来て、お店を手伝って、思い出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、やっぱり、皆を笑顔にするケーキが作りたい」
[嘉祥]: 「師匠の作るケーキは、本当に美味しくて、優しい味で……皆を笑顔にしてくれるんです」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがとう。そう言ってもらえて、嬉しいわ」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、なんだか、いろいろと考えすぎて……最初の気持ちを忘れていたというか……」
[嘉祥]: 「口では目指していると言いつつ、別のことに捕らわれていたように思います」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」
[Beignet]: 「Looks like I wasn't able to help after all.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's not true!」
[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」
[Beignet]: 「...Thank you. It warms my heart to hear you say that.」
[Kashou]: 「It's sort of like I've been thinking of so much... I've lost sight of my initial focus...」
[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Ah, sorry..."
[Beignet]: "I ended up not being of much help, didn't I?"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "No, not at all!"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Ah... well... I still don't really understand what my father meant by 'core'..."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "But coming here, helping out at the shop... I remembered."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "The cakes you make, Master, are truly delicious, with such a gentle flavor... they make everyone smile."
[Beignet]: "...Thank you. I'm really happy to hear that."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I think I got caught up in overthinking things... I forgot my original feelings, somehow..."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Even though I say I'm aiming for that, I feel like I've been caught up in something else entirely."

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「前にも言ったとおり、嘉祥のお父さんの真意はわからないけれど、私は貴方のことを応援しているわ」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、俺がケーキを作る理由は、何度も話しているけれど……師匠のことは聞いたことがないですよね」
[ベニエ]: 「……そうね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、前に聞いたときは、ケーキを作る理由は、私がパティシエールだからって答えられたんですけど……」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……そうだったかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「それなら、パティシエールになった理由は、どうなんでしょうか？」
[ベニエ]: 「……この店は……私の祖母の代からのもので、ずっとケーキを作ってきたの」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥の家ほどではないけれど、守るべき伝統があると思っているわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "As I've said before, I may not understand the true intentions of your father, Kashou, but I'm supporting you."
Minaduki Kashou: "Thank you."
Minaduki Kashou: "Now that you mention it, I've explained my reason for making cakes many times... but I've never heard about your story, Master."
Beignet: "……Yes, that's true."
Minaduki Kashou: "Well, the last time I asked, you said it was because I'm a patissier, but..."
Beignet: "Hehe... was that really what I said?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Then, why did you become a patissier?"
Beignet: "……This shop... has been around since my grandmother's time, and we've always made cakes."
Beignet: "Though not to the same extent as your family, I believe there's a tradition worth preserving."

metadata:

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ん？　あれ、俺……実家が和菓子屋だとは言ったけど、そんな歴史あるって話はしましたっけ？」
洋菓子を教えてもらうために弟子入りするのに、実家の和菓子屋が老舗だという話は、場違いな気がして避けていたのだが……
[ベニエ]: 「それは……」
[時雨]: 「すみません、兄様！　私が、今朝」
[嘉祥]: 「え？」
[時雨]: 「兄様の状況を知っておいていただく必要がある、と考えまして。差し出がましい真似を……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、いいんだ。隠してたわけじゃないから」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ……時雨から事情を聞いたのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだったんですね。あっ、余計な話をして、すみません。このラ・ソレイユに伝統があるという話でしたよね」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hm? Huh? I... did say that my family owned a Japanese pastry shop, but did I ever mention that they had a history?」
I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...
[Beignet]: 「Well...」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies, Nii-sama! I told her this morning!」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」
[Shigure]: 「I thought she needed to know about your situation, so I did something rather intrusive...」
[Kashou]: 「No, it's all good. I wasn't trying to keep it a secret.」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... Shigure told me about your situation.」
[Kashou]: 「So, that's how you know. Oh, I'm sorry for cutting you off. You were saying something about the tradition of La Soleil?」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Huh? Wait, I did say my family runs a wagashi shop, but did I mention anything about it having such a long history?"
I'd avoided bringing it up, feeling it was out of place since I was here to learn Western pastries...
[Beignet]: "That is..."
[Shigure]: "I'm sorry, Onii-sama! I, um, this morning..."
[Kashou]: "Huh?"
[Shigure]: "I thought it was necessary for you to know about your current situation. I'm being forward... I'm sorry..."
[Kashou]: "No, it's fine. I wasn't hiding anything."
[Beignet]: "Yes... I heard the situation from Shigure."
[Kashou]: "Ah, I see. Sorry for bringing up something unnecessary. You were talking about the traditions of La Soleil, weren't you?"

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そうなんですか？」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ、いろいろと事情があって」

[ベニエ]: 「ええ、そういうことに……」
[ベニエ]: 「いいえ、違うわね」

[嘉祥]: 「未練……？」

[嘉祥]: 「息子さんが、いたとは聞いたことがありましたが……」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ、私が若かった頃――」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Is that so?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, due to various complications.」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, was your reason for making pastries to uphold the flavor from your grandmother's generation?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that's how it ended up...」
[Beignet]: 「No, let me correct myself.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason I create pastries is most likely out of... regret.」
[Kashou]: 「Regret...?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière...」
Judging from Fraise's behavior, she seems to know the reasons behind Mentor saying that.

Question:

[ベニエ]: 「その頃にね……私の作ったお菓子が、皆を笑顔にする、と息子が言ったのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「息子がママはお日様みたいだねと言ってくれた」
[ベニエ]: 「この店の名前をラ・ソレイユにしたのは、その言葉があってのことなの」
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど、そういう由来が……」
ようやくラ・ソレイユの由来が聞けて、俺は嬉しかった。
しかし、ただ幸せなだけの話ではないようだった。
[時雨]: 「……ご子息を……ご家族を愛していたのですね」

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「We married, and I gave birth to a son... For a while, the three of us lived together.」
[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "We got married, my son was born, and for a while, we lived together as a family of three."
Beignet: "Back then... my son told me that the sweets I made brought smiles to everyone."
Beignet: "He said, 'Mommy is like the sun.'"
Beignet: "That's why I named the shop La Soleil—because of those words."
Kashou: "I see, so that's the origin..."
Finally hearing the origin of La Soleil, I felt happy.
Yet, it didn't seem to be just a happy story.
Shigure: "…You loved your son… your family deeply, didn't you?"
Beignet: "Yes, I did."
Beignet: "But I had to leave Japan."
Beignet: "My older brother, who was supposed to inherit this shop, passed away too soon..."

Question:

[フレーズ]: 「家族が……一番だったのですか？」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね……私にとっての、お菓子は……息子が笑顔になってくれるものだった」
[ベニエ]: 「私が作っているお菓子は、幼い息子が美味しいと褒めてくれた味なのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「今も作り続けているのは、いつかまた息子が食べて喜んでくれるかもしれない、と思って」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう、未練なのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「あの……ご家族は、今は……？」
下宿させてもらって、毎日のように店を手伝っていたが、電話も郵便も、家族らしき者から連絡が来たことはなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I can't believe that's what happened...」
[Beignet]: 「I was still young back then and not wise. I tried chasing after a lot of things...」
[Beignet]: 「After I lost it all, I realized what was truly precious to me.」
[Fraise]: 「Was it... family?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... To me, my pastries were always... something that brought a smile to my son's face.」
[Beignet]: 「The pastries I make are imbued with the flavor that my young son complimented me for.」
[Beignet]: 「I think that I still make them to this day on the off-chance that my son might eat them in joy one day.」
[Beignet]: 「...That is the regret I speak of.」
[Kashou]: 「Um... Where is your family now...?」
I lodged here with Mentor's permission and helped in the shop each day, but I don't remember a single phone call, package, or message from anyone even resembling family.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "I had no idea something like that had happened..."
[Beignet]: "Back then, I was still young and not wise enough. I chased after so many things..."
[Beignet]: "Only after losing them did I realize what was truly important."
[Fraise]: "Was it... family? That was the most important thing?"
[Beignet]: "Yes... for me, sweets were... something that brought a smile to my son's face."
[Beignet]: "The sweets I make are the very taste my young son once praised as delicious."
[Beignet]: "I still make them today, hoping that one day my son might eat them again and smile."
[Beignet]: "...That's the kind of lingering attachment I have."
[Kashou]: "Um... what about your family now...?"
I stayed as a lodger and helped out at the shop every day, but never received any contact—no phone calls, no letters—from anyone resembling family.

Question:

[Kashou]: 「Considering his feelings...」

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「I don't think  what you did in the past was a mistake, but I do think it's a fact that you couldn't take your son's feelings into consideration at the time.」

[Beignet]: "Isn't that just a convenient fantasy for me?"

[Kashou]: "I'm sorry for speaking so recklessly."

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「...Forgive me, Mentor. I didn't mean to make you tell such a sad tale.」
[Beignet]: 「No, I had been thinking I should talk about it eventually anyway.」

[Kashou]: 「Me? On the right path? Well, I'd... certainly like to think so.」
Mentor regrets the fact that she was separated from her family.
I left my house voluntarily and became estranged from my parents.
Ever since that verbal spat I had on my mom's birthday, I haven't gotten in contact with them even once.
I'd say it definitely feels as though I'm on the wrong path, but...
[Beignet]: 「Right now, you have not only mastered the skills of a capable pâtissièr, but something else very important.」
ModelAnswer:

[Beignet]: "No… I've always thought it was better to talk about it someday."  
[Beignet]: "I believe you won't stray from the right path, Kashou."  
[Kashou]: "Me? Stray from the path? …I hope that's true."  
Mentor regrets having been separated from his family.  
I left home on my own, and have grown distant from my parents.  
I haven't contacted them since our last argument on my mother's birthday.  
I can't help but feel I've already gone astray…  
[Beignet]: "Right now, Kashou, you've acquired something far more important than just the skill of a patissier."

[Shigure]: 「Also, I couldn't just use the same shoes and underwear for this dress and kimono. I also needed loungewear, as well.」
[Shigure]: 「And I didn't research on how to use the French luggage delivery services.」

[Shigure]: 「O-Oh, is that so?」
[Kashou]: 「Coming from personal experience... you're pretty much leaving it to chance.」
[Shigure]: 「Well, that sounds no good.」

Shigure is dragging a large carry-on suitcase. It looks quite heavy.

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨、大変なら持ってあげるから、無理をする前に言ってくれよ？」
[時雨]: 「あ……」
[時雨]: 「兄様、ちょっと変わりましたね……」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、重たい荷物を運んでいる妹を気遣うくらい、今までだってしただろ？」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなに薄情な人間ではなかったと思うぞ。むしろ、お節介なくらいで……」
[時雨]: 「はい。今も昔も、兄様はとっても優しくて、素敵です」
[時雨]: 「でも、以前なら、私の言葉を待つことなく、重そうだから持ってあげるよと言うかと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そう、かな……？」
[時雨]: 「それはそれで、とても嬉しいことですし、私は感謝したと思いますが」
[時雨]: 「でも、今の兄様は、私に判断を任せてくれました」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, I can take that for you if it's too much, so just ask before you break your back.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」
[Shigure]: 「That being the case, it's an extremely kind gesture, and I would appreciate it.」
[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」
ModelAnswer:
[Master]: "Shigure, if it's too heavy, I'll carry it for you. Just say so before pushing yourself, okay?"
[Shigure]: "Ah..."
[Shigure]: "Onii-sama... you've changed a little, haven't you..."
[Master]: "Huh? I've always worried about my little sister carrying heavy loads, haven't I?"
[Master]: "I don't think I've ever been that cold-hearted. If anything, I've been overly meddlesome..."
[Shigure]: "Yes. You've always been kind and wonderful, both now and in the past."
[Shigure]: "But back then, you'd have just taken it from me without waiting for my words, saying 'It looks heavy, let me carry it.'"
[Master]: "Is that so...?"
[Shigure]: "That would have been very touching, and I would have been grateful."
[Shigure]: "But now, Onii-sama... you're letting me decide for myself."

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと自覚はないのでしょう。ちょっとした変化です。兄様マニアの私でなければ、見逃してしまいますわ」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おう……」
俺自身のことなのに、妹のほうが把握しているというのも、どうかと思うが……
[時雨]: 「ここ数日のことだけでなく……きっと、これまでの日々の積み重ねが、兄様を変えたのでしょうね」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は何も変わったつもりはないけれど、時雨が言うのなら、変わったのかもしれない」
ネコたちと過ごした日々があって、師匠の言葉があって、今の俺が形作られているのだろう。
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、師匠があれだけの話をしてくれたんだ。俺だって少しは学ぶさ」
[時雨]: 「学びはありましたか？」

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You probably don't realize it yourself since it's such a minor change. If I weren't such a Nii-sama fanatic, I would have overlooked it myself.」
[Kashou]: 「U-Uh, sure...」
Not sure how I feel about my sister being able to pick up on something about me better than... well, me.
[Shigure]: 「I'm sure that the past few days alone haven't changed you... but rather, the culmination of the days leading up until now have.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't really think I've changed any, but maybe I did if you say so.」
The days I spent with the girls, my mentor's words— all those things have probably helped shape the person I am now.
[Kashou]: 「Well, Mentor was willing to share that much of her story with me. I could learn a thing or two myself.」
[Shigure]: 「Were you able to learn anything?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think. I tried thinking of my own reasons for pastry-making.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "You probably aren't aware of it yourself. It's just a small change. Only someone as obsessed with my brother as I am would notice it."
Kashou: "O-oh..."
It's strange, really—my own sister understands me better than I do.
Shigure: "Not just these past few days... It must be the accumulation of all the days before that which has changed my brother."
Kashou: "I don't feel like I've changed at all, but if Shigure says so, maybe I have."
The days spent with the cats, the words of my master—those are what shaped who I am now.
Kashou: "Well, the master gave me such a long talk. I suppose I learned a little something too."
Shigure: "Did you learn anything?"
Kashou: "Probably. I actually thought about why I make Western pastries."

Question:

[時雨]: 「もしかしたら、そういう気持ちはあるのかもしれません」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm starting to think those were just words.」
[Shigure]: 「No way! No way they're just words...」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean the real reason deep in my heart... I tried giving my own feelings some deep thought.」
[Kashou]: 「Ultimately, I... just want dad to approve of me.」
[Kashou]: 「A little too old to be going through my rebellious teenager phase, I know.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm pretty sure I'm being egotistical and trying to seek approval.」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, Shigure. Did I shatter your illusion of me...?」
[Shigure]: 「Is that your reason for making pastries, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「If it wasn't, I wouldn't be this broken up about dad disapproving of me.」
[Shigure]: 「That could very well play a part in it, yes.」
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I've been thinking it might have just been words, you know."
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Such a thing... just words?"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "No, I mean... the real reason deep down inside... I really took the time to think about my own feelings."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "In the end, I... just want my father to acknowledge me."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Am I not just going through a late-stage rebellion?"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I'm probably just a selfish fool full of the need for approval."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I'm sorry, Shigure... did I disappoint you...?"
[Minaduki Shigure]: "So that's why you make Western-style sweets?"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "If it weren't for that, I wouldn't have been this troubled over my father's disapproval."
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Maybe... there's some truth to that feeling."

[Kashou]: 「Um, yeah...」

ModelAnswer:

[Kashou]: "U-uh..."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……けっこう遅くなったな」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。夕食には戻れるかと思っていたのですが」
飛行機の到着がやや遅れ、俺たちは夜になって帰宅した。
まだネコたちが店にいるだろうから、と時雨も水無月家ではなく、俺と一緒にラ・ソレイユへ。
[嘉祥]: 「さすがにこの行脚はキツかったな」
しかも、向こうでは立ち仕事が多かった。
[時雨]: 「私は、ぜんぜん大丈夫です。　お気遣いは無用です、兄様」
気丈に笑みを浮かべるが、疲労の色は隠せない。
[嘉祥]: 「ウチで休んでいくといい。　なんなら泊まって、明日帰ってもいいし」
[時雨]: 「お泊まりですか！？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Phew... It sure got late.」
[Shigure]: 「That it did. I thought that we could make it back in time for dinner.」
My plane landed somewhat late, so I end up home around nighttime.
Figuring that the catgirls would be at the shop, Shigure comes with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki house.
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I guess the trek over was asking a lot.」
Plus, we did so much work on our feet overseas.
[Shigure]: 「I'm perfectly fine. You needn't worry about me, Nii-sama.」
Shigure gives a firm smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.
[Kashou]: 「You can rest up at my house. You can also stay over and go back home tomorrow, if you want.」
[Shigure]: 「Stay over?!」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Phew... It's gotten pretty late, hasn't it?"
Shigure: "Yes, I was hoping we'd make it back in time for dinner."
The plane's arrival was slightly delayed, and we returned home after dark.
Since the cats were still at the shop, Shigure came with me to La Soleil instead of going back to the Minaduki household.
Kashou: "This journey's been tough, I'll admit."
Especially since there was a lot of standing work over there.
Shigure: "I'm perfectly fine. There's no need to worry, Brother-sama."
She forces a brave smile, but her exhaustion is unmistakable.
Kashou: "You should rest here. You could even stay the night and head back tomorrow."
Shigure: "Staying over!?!"

[時雨]: 「そうですね……気をつけます、兄様」
reference_answer:
[Coconut]: 「Yup, let's hurry back! Hurry!」
[Azuki]: 「Okay, that's what you say, but you just wanted to walk the Christmas streets with Kashou, didn't ya, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Shigure]: 「W-Well, when you phrase it that way...」
[Shigure]: 「Granted, if you asked me if walking together would make me happy, then... of course it would!」
[Shigure]: 「I mean... it's a special day, and doing so would...」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, let's go, Shigure. You don't want to make us wait for you, do you?」
[Shigure]: 「Coming, Nii-sama!」
[Kashou]: 「But if you wanted to walk together, try coming here a little earlier next time, all right?」
[Kashou]: 「Walking by yourself after dark can be dangerous, you know.」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, you're right... I'll bear that in mind, Nii-sama.」

[Shigure]: "Ugh..."

[Shigure]: "But... on such an important day, doing something like that..."

[Shigure]: "Yes, Master!"

[Shigure]: "Yes, I'll be more careful, Master."

Question:
[メイプル]: 「そういえば、時雨が勝手にフランスに行ったことは、ちゃんと許してもらえたの？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～、置き手紙１つだったから、お母さん怒ってましたよね～？」
[淡雪]: 「そうねー。相談もなしに急に行っちゃうものだから、心配したわー」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ありませんでした……」
[淡雪]: 「でもまぁ、嘉祥が一緒だったみたいだし」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も驚いたけどな」
[淡雪]: 「お土産のフィナンシェが美味しかったから許したわ♪」
母親は怒ると海より深く静かに怒るタイプだが、美味しい食べ物で、だいたい何でも許してくれるのだった。
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「That reminds me, did he ever forgive you for just up and going to France, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "By the way, did Shigure actually get permission after sneaking off to France like that?"
Shigure: "Ugh..."
Cinnamon: "Ah~ it was just a note left behind, so Mom was really mad, right?"
Awayuki: "Yeah. She was worried sick, going off without even talking to anyone first."
Shigure: "I'm truly sorry..."
Awayuki: "But well, since Kashou was with her, it's not that bad."
Kashou: "I was surprised too, you know."
Awayuki: "And the French pastry she brought back was so delicious, I forgave her♪"
Mother was the type who got angry like the sea—deep and silent—but she usually forgave anything if there was something delicious to eat.

Question:

[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Oh wow, a Christmas present!? Thank you, Mother-sama!"
[Awayuki]: "It might be a bit early, but you know, Kashou might get angry and leave again, right?"
[Shigure]: "Ugh..."
[Kashou]: "I-It's not going to happen today! Please trust me."
[Awayuki]: "Yes, and for you too, Kashou."
[Kashou]: "Ah, yeah... thank you."
[Awayuki]: "Go ahead, open it?"
As instructed, I peeled off the wrapping paper and opened the small box.
[Kashou]: "...A photo frame?"
There didn't seem to be a photo inside.
[Awayuki]: "I thought it might be fun to hang one memory from this year in your room?"
Then I remembered—Shigure had given it to Mother as a birthday gift, since Mother had wanted one.
